channel.title: Patreon on MillMint
channel.description: Recent content in Patreon on MillMint

item.title: Polyester
item.description: Polyester 👚 SNAPSHOT Letters People across the world are very excited by the possibilities and emerging styles in new synthetic materials, including polyester, plastic, and new-nylon. In keeping with her meticulous and mildly neurotic character, Tzipora cannot stand synthetic fibres and refuses wear anything that isn’t soft, loose-fitting and hand-washable. Like most metrics kept in her head, it’s largely arbitrary and fluctuates depending on the visibility of materials and her awareness of it, but does invariably inform her sense of fashion, leaving her conservative and old-fashioned in appearance as her peers take on increasingly colourful (and avant garde) styles made possible by a materials revolution.

item.title: Preview
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-orange); } Atomic Modern Preview 🚏 COMIC Story 🌺 Tip: press the black circle in the menu to read in dark mode 🌺 Note from the Editor: This draft represents the final copy used as a reference for inking – the final lines. It’s not pretty, but it is legible, and once all the inking and lettering and tone work is done it’ll be quite special.
